body.p:
Louisville Ky Augst 9th 1864
To Governor Thos Bramlett
Frankfort Ky

Dear Sir at the solicitation of many friends I have concluded to Raise a Battalion For the Purpose of Fighting the Raving Bands of Theives and cutthroats who are Killing many of our Citizens &c If this meets your approbation I wish you would send me permisin as soon as you can For There is many anxious to go into such Service now nothing more only I am
N. B. my Respects to Gen Combs
